items.text: full on leg stump, driven to midwicket
items.postText:
Mustafa Moudi: "B'desh had all 10 wickets in hand when Das was on 85 and lost 4 wickets by the time he reached 95 runs..."

Gaurav Madan: "Exceptional control percentage for that knock. A wonderful 100. BDESH must capitalize on this and bring them home."
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, pushed uppishly back to the bowler
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped into the covers off the front foot
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: short ball on middle stump, turns it to deep square's left with the horizontal bat
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
items.postText: Sushant: "Liton's immaculate sweeps remind of Gooch as he swept Maninder Singh and India away in 1987 WC"
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.postText: Bappa: "My 5 year old, playing "Name Place Animal Thing", was stuck at name starting with L. Not any more! Well played Liton Das."
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Varun. What a comeback it's been from India, and all the wickets have been so soft. Bangladesh have lost four wickets in the space of 19 runs, but Mahmudullah is a very calm customer. Can he assist Liton towards a big total?
items.text: full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to the off side
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and spinning inwards. Fended off the front foot
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: the wrong'un! But Mahmudullah keeps his eyes on the ball. Full delivery turning away, and carved with soft hands to cover point
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. No run
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: flighted full on middle stump. He comes onto the front foot, and drives this straight back to Kuldeep. Sharp work from the bowler on his followthrough
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: half-tracker on middle stump, and he rocks back to pull this hard! Chase for KL Rahul at deep midwicket, but he runs to his right and dives to stop a certain boundary
items.postText: Rizwan: "31 st over...jadhav?????" -- no, it's Kuldeep. Just a glitch that we've fixed now
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he gets onto the front foot for a cover drive. Stopped by Jadeja
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, and he stays on the back foot. Punched straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of a length, but slower from Bhuvi. He throws his hands at it, and the jab takes a top-edge between the keeper and short third man for a single
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and firmly driven off the front foot with the angled bat. Straight to cover once again
items.shortText: Kumar to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and aimed at the wickets. Tentatively driven to mid off
items.shortText: Kumar to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: good length, that test match line just outside off stump. Fended with the angled bat to point, but says no to the single
items.postText:
Srinivas: "That run out should be added in the "wickets" column of Ravindra Jadeja ..."

Shihab: "Liton's issue is his running. Even with mehedi, he refused plenty of easy enough singles..."
items.shortText: Kumar to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and pushed off the front foot towards the leg side. Played with soft hands
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he slogs across the line. Not hit off the bat's middle, and Bumrah does really well to run to his right from cow corner and then slide across the grass to take a double-handed catch. Not the prettiest of catches, but he did well to compose himself after putting in the yards. Bangladesh at 151 for 5
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, OUT

dismissal.text: Mahmudullah c Bumrah b Kuldeep Yadav 4 (16b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

items.text: good length on middle, and turning across the batsman. Worked off his hips to the leg side
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good length on off, and spinning inwards sharply. Pulled off the back foot, but mistimed to deep square leg
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Ganesh: "From dropping a dolly of Tamim in T20 WC to taking two wonderful catches here the rise of Jasprit Bumrah has been the best thing for Indian Cricket in recent years."
items.text: through him! Full outside off, and spinning into the left-hander as he tries to play the expansive drive. The ball sneaks between bat and pad on this occasion
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and spinning across the batsman. Sarkar tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball hits his front leg and then ricochets onto his bat. Muted appeal for lbw from Kuldeep, but Dhoni says not to review. Good call from India, was too high
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, no run
